src:
Ronald Lee Thomas

06 Nov 2019, 15:14

MADISON - Ronald Lee Thomas, age 67, of Madison, passed away on Sunday, Nov. 3, 2019, at Belmont Nursing Home.
A memorial service will be held at GUNDERSON EAST FUNERAL AND CREMATION CARE, 5203 Monona Drive, Madison, at 2 p.m. on Monday, Nov. 11, 2019. A visitation will be held at the funeral home from 12:30 p.m. until the time of the service on Monday.
Online condolences may be made at www.gundersonfh.com.Gunderson EastFuneral & Cremation Care5203 Monona Drive(608) 221-5420
